def_cn: (3岁马匹参加的一年一度的)德比马赛(在英国指于埃普瑟姆举行的马赛，在美国特指肯塔基马赛)
def_en: The Derby is the name of a race for three-year-old horses that takes place each year. In Britain, it refers to a race that takes place in Epsom. In the United States, it refers particularly to the Kentucky Derby.

def_cn: (同一地区或城市的两队之间的)德比大赛;同城比赛
def_en: A derby is a sporting event involving teams from the same area or city.

def_cn: (任何人都可参加的)比赛
def_en: A derby is a sports competition or race where there are no restrictions or limits on who can enter.
A derby is a round, hard hat with a narrow brim which is worn by men. Derbies are no longer very common.
